answerText: Phoenecians[10] Like the Hittites, the Phoenicians were attacked by this collection of maritime raiders, who are often blamed for the Bronze Age collapse in many parts of the Mediterranean. This mysterious civilization also invaded Egypt as described in the Great Karnak Inscription.
heading: DRAGOON |2013 | 12 | 19 | Literature | Classical | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: Homer praises the skill of these people in making glass, much of which came from the city of Sidon. For 10 points each: [10] Name this Semitic civilization based in present-day Lebanon, which expanded into a vast trading network throughout the Mediterranean and which used an alphabet that is the ancestor of the Greek and Latin alphabets.
